00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include "hope/tuple/generated.h"
00012 #include "hope/tuple/detect_fields_count.h"
00013 
00018 namespace hope {
00019 
00028     template <typename T, typename FieldPolicy = field_policy::value>
00029     constexpr auto tuple_from_struct(T&& object, FieldPolicy p = FieldPolicy{}) {
00030         constexpr auto fields_count = detect_fields_count<std::decay_t<T>>();
00031         return detail::generated::tuple_from_struct(std::forward<T>(object), detail::Int<fields_count>{}, FieldPolicy{});
00032     }
00033 
00034 }
